description:
Happy tap: 1986-2002
• Car sales in 1930s
• 1960s Pero’s Hotel (House)
• Country music
• 1976 -1981Peros Tavern
• Mechanical bull
• 1981 Jerseys’ tavern (female strip club)
• 1992: Miss Gay Happy Tap was Serena Garret (Gary Menard)
• 1993: Miss Lesbian/Gay Pride Day was Serena Garret
• 1994: Miss Happy Tap Amanda Collins
• 1996: Miss Happy Tap Duchess of Windsor Karen White (Robert Henry)
• 1997 Miss Happy tap Diva and DiAngela Shannon
• 1987-88: Maybes (lesbian bar) basement
• 2012: Legends 2012 at 1056 Wyandotte E
